name: Saiyuuki: Kinkaku, Ginkaku no Inbou
description: Saiyuuki: Kinkaku, Ginkaku no Inbou is a DS action-platformer game based on the 2007 adaptation of Journey to the West. There are a total of nine stages, divided into 3 sections followed by a boss battle. You can switch between the three main characters of Sun Wukong, Sha Wujing and Zhu Bajie, each of which has unique attributes. Defeating enemies earns you experience points, allowing you to level up each character up to a maximum of level 5. There are 3 difficulty levels to choose from, as well as optional training stages which allow you to earn new techniques for each character.
